TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LengthConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 在表示对象长度的 的实例与其他类型的实例之间相互转换。

span.span: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of a that represent an object's length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持在以下类型之间进行转换： 、、、、、、、、 和 。 supports conversion to and from the following types: , , , , , , , , , and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用对象的实例 。The following example shows how to create and use an instance of the object. 定义了一个名为的自定义方法 `ChangeLeft` ，该方法将 在单独的文件) 中定义的 (的内容转换 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 为的实例 ，稍后转换为 。A custom method called `ChangeLeft` is defined, which converts the content of a (defined in a separate [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] file) to an instance of , and later into a . 此方法将传递 给一个 对象，该对象将转换 为的实例 。This method passes the to a object, which converts the to an instance of . 请注意，此值已 通过使用方法转换为 。Notice that this value has already been converted to a by using the method. 然后，将此值传递回 方法，并将 方法传递回的方法， 以更改对象的位置 `text1` 。This value is then passed back to the method and the method of the in order to change the position of the `text1` object. [!code-csharp[CanvasPositioningProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasPositioningProperties/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CanvasPositioningProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasPositioningProperties/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]
